original_text: And cast him into the bottomless pit, and shut him up, and set a seal upon him, that he should deceive the nations no more, till the thousand years should be fulfilled: and after that he must be loosed a little season.
korean_text: 무저갱에 던져 넣어 잠그고 그 위에 인봉하여 천 년이 차도록 다시는 만국을 미혹하지 못하게 하였는데 그 후에는 반드시 잠깐 놓이리라

sentences.original_text: And cast him into the bottomless pit
and set a seal upon him
that he should deceive the nations no more
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 더 이상 민족들을 미혹하지 못하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: till the thousand years should be fulfilled
he must be loosed a little season
